meanings.sent1: The assurgent plant reached for the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The mountain had an assurgent slope.
meanings.sent3: The assurgent vines seemed to be on a mission to touch the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her assurgent ambitions propelled her to new heights.
meanings.sent5: The assurgent flames danced towards the ceiling.

meanings.definition: Rising or advancing in position or power.
meanings.sent1: The company's assurgent success was evident to all.
meanings.sent2: His assurgent influence in the community was undeniable.
meanings.sent3: The cat's assurgent climb to the top of the tree was quite a sight.
meanings.sent4: The assurgent wave of support carried him to victory.
meanings.sent5: The assurgent leader guided the team to greatness.
